description: A financial ledger for a Fiscal Year

allocated.description: The amount currently allocated to this ledger in the FY

available.description: The amount currently available in this ledger in the FY

netTransfers.description: Summing all the transfers from/to this ledger. Amount can be negative

unavailable.description: The amount already utilized from the allocated amount

currency.description: Ideally this is the currency ISO code for FY
